name: Server Live Test
description: Tests if servers are online and posts a notification when they're not.

name: SMS Gateway Test
description: Tests if SMS Gateways are online and posts a notification when they are not.

name: Server Disk Space Test
description: Tests if server has >20% disk space and posts a notification when free space is <20%

name: CouchDB Compaction Test
description: Makes sure CouchDB compaction is enabled and working.

name: HTTPS Only Test
description: Tests whether instances are accessible via insecure http.

name: CouchApps Latest Version Test
description: Tests whether instances have latest versions of the couchapps

name: Couchdb Fragmentation Test
description: Tests whether couchdb db fragmentation exceeds 70% and view fragmentation exceeds 60%

name: Node Version Test
description: Tests whether the node version in use by the instance is the new one

name: Couchdb Conflicts Test
description: Tests whether there are unresolved conflicts in couchdb

name: Date/Time monitoring
description: Makes sure that date/time sync is working on servers
